QuestData.Title: Roadside Assistance
QuestData.Description: A luckydo remembers to bring incense on a journey in to the mountains. The smellier the luck the better.$b$bCan you journey up the road to One Keg and light the incense you find along the way?$b$bThis will give good fortune to grummles that must travel the road.$b$bBrother Lintpocket can give you many rewards. Speak to him when you arrive.
QuestData.LogDescription: Light 8 Lucky Burlap Incense sticks along the road to One Keg.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome to One Keg! Gateway to Burlap Trail and Mount Neverest.
